briefTitle: Open Label Extension Study of Nalbuphine HCl ER in Hemodialysis Patients With Uremic Pruritus
officialTitle: An Open Label Extension Study of the Safety and Anti-Pruritic Efficacy of Nalbuphine HCl ER Tablets in Hemodialysis Patients With Uremic Pruritus
summary: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the overall safety of nalbuphine HCL ER tablets during a treatment period of up to 24 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number and Percetage of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
